metadata.title: CVE-2024-53899 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: virtualenv before 20.26.6 allows command injection through the activationscripts for a virtual environment. Magic template strings are not quotedcorrectly when replacing. NOTE: this is not the same as CVE-2024-9287.

criterions.comment: python-virtualenv package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
